name: Sundown mayhem - prototype
description:
After being faced with betrayal, an unnamed bee must rescue her hive. Her only method of attack is shooting pollen out of her mouth. There's ants that chase her around, mushrooms that shoot poison, etc. 8 hitpoints to start with, it's not just 1-hit deaths. It uses a custom sound driver that isn't hugedriver- although hugedriver would probably be a better choice.

Started out as antworld and evolved into this. The sprites from antworld were later reused as enemies.

Several debug features were left in - start is used to cycle through levels, select is a debug function to test damage.
